title: Advanced Korean: Third Year III
description: Students will learn advanced level skills in listening, speaking, reading, and writing Korean, and expand their understanding of Korean culture. Topics: customs and superstitions, Korean folktales and proverbs, Korean culture of community, Korea during the Japanese colonial period, Korea and Korean. Students may receive a combined total of twelve units for LTKO 130, LTKO 130F, LTKO 130W, and LTKO 130P.  Prerequisites:  LTKO 2C or equivalent level of proficiency with consent of instructor.
